resources.string: Connect with new people and create moments.

The application has a main view of the location where you are and the closest plans, you can select any of them and a new window opens with all the information of that plan: name, place, date, price and a link to the web to be able to register
2. How can I find activities and events near my location?
You must have the location of your mobile device activated and you will see some hand-shaped markers that indicate the places on the map where the plans are located
3. How can I reserve a place in an event or activity?

When you find the plan you want, you can click on the map and it will take you to a window that provides you with all the information and a link to the website where you can reserve a place or sign up for the plan.
4. Is there a reservation limit per event or activity?
The entity that makes them is in charge of managing the reservations and which can be accessed through the link of each plan that is offered from our application.
5. How can I see the plans I like?

This app has the possibility of saving in favorites (click on the heart of each activity) the activities that you like the most and you can access that list in the favorites button in the lower menu of the application
6. How can I unroll from a plan?
Each activity is managed by a different entity and it is that entity that should be contacted to consult the possibilities of canceling the plan or unsubscribing from the activity
7. How can I make a suggestion or report a problem?

In the application there is a drop-down menu in the upper left part of the screen where an option to contact us is shown and you can write to us whenever you have a problem or a suggestion, we will attend to you as soon as possible trying to solve your problem or improve the app with your suggestions
8. Does using the application have any cost?
The use of the application is free of charge. There is also no premium version or additional payments to have access to some extra functionality of the application. It is 100% free for all users
9. Is the application available in my city/country?

Currently the application is only available for the city of Madrid, although in the not too distant future we plan to be present in more cities and countries. If you want it to be in your region, do not hesitate to contact us to send us your request!
10. Can I contact the people who are signed up for the activity?

In the first versions of the app the chat is not yet available, as soon as possible you will have a chat available to contact all the people who are signed up for the activity and want to have conversations with the attendees of the activity or event
We will respond as soon as possible, check the email you provide in this form
